text: The World Figure Skating Championships are an annual figure skating competition done by the International Skating Union. Medals are awarded in men's singles, women's singles, pair skating, and ice dance. It is usually held in March. The World Championships are thought to be the most important of the ISU Figure Skating Championships. In 2024, the World Figure Skating Championships were held in Montreal, Canada. It will be held in Boston, Massachusetts in 2025. ==References== Category:Figure skating
title: World Figure Skating Championships
